db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates how to read and write to XBEL files.

db:article.db:programlisting:
HEADERS = mainwindow.h \ xbelreader.h \ xbelwriter.h SOURCES = main.cpp \ mainwindow.cpp \ xbelreader.cpp \ xbelwriter.cpp QT += xml widgets
EXAMPLE_FILES = frank.xbel jennifer.xbel
# install target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/xml/streambookmarks INSTALLS += target
